Label: Training
Definition: Processing of data to train an AI model
Contributors: Scott Kellum, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Delaram Golpayegani, Georg P. Krog, Julian Flake

Term: ai:DevelopmentOperation as a concept that defines how ai processes and operates (as data)

Label: Data Collection
Definition: Collection of data for training or operating AI models

Label: Data Annotation
Definition: Annotation of data for training or operating AI models

Label: Data Preparation
Definition: Preparing data for training or operating AI models

Label: Model Development
Definition: Processing which contributes to development of AI models

Label: Model Training
Definition: Processing of data to train an AI model

Label: Model Fine-Tuning
Definition: Processing of data to fine-tune an AI model
